title: Episode 211. Ramit and Cassandra open up: “Our real money fights (and what we learned)”
description: ﻿ In this rare and intimate episode, Ramit takes the hot seat alongside his wife, Cassandra, as they’re interviewed by their close friend Julie Nguyen. Together, Ramit and Cass pull back the curtain on how they navigate money behind the scenes—from prenup negotiations and separate finances to the regular money meetings that keep them aligned. […] Source
author: Crate Media
